title: Pull Values From Array Based on Function
description: In this lab, we will be exploring the pullBy() function in JavaScript. This function allows us to filter out specific values from an array based on a given iterator function. By the end of this lab, you will understand how to use pullBy() to manipulate arrays and effectively filter out unwanted values.

meta.title: JavaScript Array Manipulation | Pullby Function
meta.description: Learn how to use the JavaScript pullBy() function to filter and manipulate arrays based on a given iterator function. Improve your coding skills with this comprehensive tutorial.
meta.keywords: JavaScript, Array, Manipulation, pullBy, Filter, Iterator

steps.title: Pull Values From Array Based on Function
